name: Witches' Legacy: Hunter and the Hunted Collector's Edition
description: Witch hunters have kidnapped Lynn! To save her, you'll have to team up with an old foe and storm their castle.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 1411 MB available space
